iati-api-mapping.iati-activity:
select distinct a.amp_activity_id from amp_activity a, amp_activity_sector aas where a.amp_activity_id = aas.amp_activity_id and aas.classification_config_id=3 -- within transaction date AND a.amp_activity_id in ( SELECT amp_activity_id FROM v_donor_funding WHERE adjustment_type_name='Actual' AND transaction_type in (0,1) AND transaction_date >= '${txStartDate} 00:00:00' AND transaction_date < '${txEndDate} 00:00:00' ) ) -- validated activities AND a.approval_status IN ('approved','startedapproved')
;
iati-api-mapping.global-query: select amp_activity_id, amp_id, name from amp_activity where amp_activity_id=$parent;

field.query: (select to_char(a.actual_start_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as act_date, 'start_actual' as type from amp_activity a where a.amp_activity_id = $parent) UNION (select to_char(a.proposed_start_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as act_date, 'start_planned' as type from amp_activity a where a.amp_activity_id = $parent) UNION (select to_char(a.proposed_completion_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as act_date, 'end-planned' as type from amp_activity a where a.amp_activity_id = $parent) UNION (select to_char(a.actual_completion_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as act_date, 'end_actual' as type from amp_activity a where a.amp_activity_id = $parent);

select aal.location_percentage as loc_percentage, acvl.location_name as loc_name, acvl.description as loc_description from amp_activity_location aal, amp_location al, amp_category_value_location acvl where acvl.id = al.location_id and aal.amp_activity_id=$parent and aal.amp_location_id=al.amp_location_id;

select aas.sector_percentage as sector_percentage, s.name as sector_name, s.sector_code_official as sector_code, ss.sec_scheme_name as sector_scheme from amp_activity_sector aas, amp_sector_scheme ss, amp_sector s where aas.amp_activity_id=$parent and aas.classification_config_id=ss.amp_sec_scheme_id and ss.sec_scheme_code='OCDE' and aas.amp_sector_id=s.amp_sector_id;
